name: nifi
description: An easy to use, powerful, and reliable system to process and distribute data.
preInstallNotes: Nifi on DC/OS is in alpha and there may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation or other discrepancies.
postInstallNotes:
Nifi has been successfully installed.
Documentation can be found at https://nifi.apache.org/docs.html
Please keep in mind that first start of nifi can take a more than 60 seconds, so please be patient.
